text: is a compilation album from Mikuni Shimokawa. The album was released by Pony Canyon on December 17, 2003 and coded copyright PCCA-01967. The album contains theme songs from some anime series that only aired in Japan. For example, the first track on this album is the ending theme song from the anime series Miyuki, which aired in 1983. == CD == === Track listing === {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" !No.!!Title!!Lyric!!Music!!Arrange |- |1||Omoide ga Ippai||Yoko Aki||Kisaburō Suzuki||Hiroshi Uesugi |- |2||Zankoku na Tenshi no Te-ze||Neko Oikawa||Hidetoshi Satō||Hideyuki Suzuki |- |3||Rinbu -revolution-||Masami Okui||Toshiro Yabuki||ats- |- |4||ETERNAL WIND ~Hohoemi wa Hikaru Kaze no Naka~||Yui Nishikawa||Nishikawa/Yoko Orihara||h-wonder |- |5||Ai Oboete Imasu ka||Kazumi Yasui||Kazuhiko Kato||Genki Nichihino |- |6||LOVE SONG||TOM||Kaori Takagaki||Uesugi |- |7||KUJIKENAIKARA!||Satomi Arimori||Masami||H.
